Whatever software you use to torrent you should know how to use it.

I use uTorrent (or do I).

Usually you have to bring up the details of the torrent, via right-click, and in the software interface somewhere you get to modify which tracker the torrent uses.

I usually remove anything that is external to the Pirate Bay.

You can tell when a torrent has external trackers when the torrent has like crazy amount of seeders. Like right now this torrent has 5000+ seeders, cool and all but Moviex is screwing you over if you don't delete their tracker.

More info here:http://torrentfreak.com/moviex-leeches-from-bittorrent-community-071201/

Anyone know how to add subtitles for convertx to dvd?

To add subtiltes to ConvertXtoDVD creat a file with bothe the film and the subtitles in the same folder. They MUST have the same file name. Go to ConvertXtoDVD , add the video file, pick your movie and the program will automatically add the subtitles. You don't see the subtitle when you do this but the program will add it to the movie. for example dogtown.avi and dogtown.srt   I guess there have been more problems adding subs with the newest version. Once I started doing it right I have had no problems....good luck..
